agency_name: HELEN KELLER NATIONAL CENTER FOR DEAFBLIND YOUTHS AND ADULTS
agency_desc: A nonprofit organization offering assistance to the deaf-blind community.
site_name: HELEN KELLER NATIONAL CENTER FOR DEAFBLIND YOUTHS AND ADULTS - REGION 5
service_name: INFORMATION AND REFERRAL FOR VISION AND HEARING IMPAIRED
service_description: Provides information, referral, support and advocacy to individuals with combined vision and hearing loss.
site_details: Call or visit website for information; access agency's e-newsletter from website.
site_eligibility: Residents with combined vision and hearing loss -- Families -- Professionals
